name: Hearth Home (GGJ19)
description:
THIS IS A PROTOTYPE CREATED DURING THE GLOBAL GAME JAM 2019 WITHIN 48 HOURS. WE BUILT THIS GAME WITH UNITY.

In Hearth Home you control a little lumberjack who lives on a solitude peak. In these areas harsh weather rules the daily life causing damage to your home. Survive the storm seasons to win the game. You'll need to withstand the cold and fix all the damages caused by the storm.  You'll collect different resources wood, clay, stone and water to repair your house. The game is lost once your coldness meter reaches 100%. Counter this effect by having an eye on your hearth by feeding it with wood. Damages will contribute to faster depletion of wood. 

We might update this game from time to time so. Please visit us at https://www.immersive-pixels.com. Please let us know if there are any issues with the game.
